replies.msg: 最初寫blog，script擺係Dropbox就算，一路都唔想用GitHub，因為自己唔係IT狗，又唔係當CV用嘅，驚寫得唔好比人笑，有用開我ss嘅推友話方便大家叫開一個，是撚但啦,咁就開咗，好彩都有幾粒星，幾十歲收租佬嚟講算係咁啦，冇正式學過任何電腦相關嘅課程，睇過幾本書，就咁多，所以啲人話Linux難用，肯定唔啱，信我

https://github.com/Saren-Arterius



好撚多星 等我有時間睇睇先 學吓嘢
twitter有個Java佬改gfw.press 分支出去，同我講唔識設置squid3或者3proxy，後來佢個安裝script用我部份code，嗰一刻感覺幾撚光榮呀，職業programmer用我啲業餘嘢，算係最大嘅恭維啦

搵我？


冇,自high喺度鳩噏啫 唔好屌我

https://github.com/nozomi199
主要開發維護術數程式的lib為主
有時有屎忽痕野都會放上去，好似lihkg client

https://github.com/nozomi199
主要開發維護術數程式的lib為主
有時有屎忽痕野都會放上去，好似lihkg client


mark低先，要試試巴打們啲作品
我用咗GitHub先知道，好多人無條件放啲code上去，原來係為咗粒星，咁事實嗰粒星真係有啲虛榮感嘅

我嘅 github 只會用黎擺 public release/development code，唔會乜撚嘢都擺上去架


同埋用得 git 呢就真係唔該學下 Linus 嘅正統 commit message 寫法

Shortlog:
- 50 chars
- 第一隻字大階
- Imperative mood, present tense, e.g. "Fix xxx", not "Fixed xxx"
- 最尾冇 full-stop

Body:
- Wrap to 72 chars (vim 應該會自動幫你 wrap)
- Explanation

超級懶惰既我只打兩句:
- First Commit (of Branch)
- New Update on Commit

Initial commit
Support OpenShift
Add crawl status variables
Specify Node.js engine version 5.8.0
Add HTTP server
Change crawler-post.js to use callback instead of events
Change crawlPost to function instead of class
Indentation fix
Rename crawler-post.js to crawl-post.js
Change internal error handling
Change error handling
Fix coding style
Change start function
Add post list to web frontend
Add job list to web frontend
Add date formatting
Add user list to web frontend
Add user info to web frontend
Add user link for post list
Add note message
Disable hkg sensor mode
Change package name
Add uptime and heap usage to web frontend
Fix random minor bugs
Switch to hkg api (android-1-2)
Change package.json to specify node 5.9.0
Remove orderIndex field for posts in web frontend
Add csv output for posts
Add votes to postInfo
Add HTTP gzip compression
Force https on openshift
Add post message list
Change var to let
